contentencoded:
Last week we asked you to tell us your stories about the hidden cost of the holidays.. and whether and how you budget for them. Many of you answered.

Lizzie O'Leary is joined by Lauren Lyons Cole, a contributor to TheStreet, and a certified financial planner, to talk about tips and tricks for budgeting during the holidays.

Tell us your stories by visiting our website, or tweet us, we're @MarketplaceWKND.

title: Your Wallet: How do you budget your holiday season?
